thread.title: Drake Appears to Be in the Middle of This Justin-Weeknd-Selena Drama
thread.title_full: Drake Appears to Be in the Middle of This Justin-Weeknd-Selena Drama

title: Drake Appears to Be in the Middle of This Justin-Weeknd-Selena Drama
text: By Kayleigh Roberts Mar 26, 2017 When you're friends with a couple and that couple breaks up, it can be hard not to feel like you're stuck in the middle. So we feel for Drake, who was a longtime Jelena supporter and friend to Justin and Selena. Because he supports love and his friends and the love of his friends, Drake has also been liking several of The Weeknd and Selena's Instagrams . That's what friends do. They like each other's Instagrams and support the new relationships that are making those friends deliriously, fly-around-the-whole-world happy .   A post shared by @drakelikedthis on Mar 18, 2017 at 3:54am PDT Most Popular So what does this mean for Drake's friendship with fellow Canadian/famous Selena ex Justin Bieber? Maybe nothing, because Justin just posted the sweetest, most supportive comment on Drake's Instagram. "You were born to kill those last two shows!!! Proud of you!" he wrote. A post shared by Justin Bieber Crew (@jbcrewdotcom) on Mar 25, 2017 at 3:47pm PDT If that's not proof that Justin and Drake are cool, we honestly don't know what is. More from ELLE:
